1.text: Place 1⁄2 cup (120 mL) of cold water in a small saucepan on the stove.

2.text: Add 2 tbsp (20 g) of unflavored gelatin to the water.

3.text: Add 1 packet (85 g) of flavored gelatin and mix well.

4.text: Heat up the mixture on medium-low heat for 10-15 minutes.

5.text: Turn the heat off and pour the mixture into a mixing cup.

6.text: Pour the mixture into your molds and put them in the freezer for 15-20 minutes.

7.text: Pre-measure your ingredients to make classic “Gold Bears.

9.text: Blend your sugar, sorbitol, and glucose syrup on the stove at medium heat.

10.text: Mix in your gelatin mixture slowly.

12.text: Pour the mixture into your mold.

13.text: Sprinkle your gummies lightly with citric acid to get a sour coating.

14.text: Use lemon and honey for citrus gummy bears.

15.text: Try pureed strawberries or berries in your gummies.

16.text: Replace the water with milk for a creamier texture.
